website_summaries.verdict: A durable, straightforward wine preserver that's specifically designed to be easy to use.
pros: This bottle stopper makes it easy to pump out air and vacuum seal your wine to preserve it
The handle has an ergonomic design, and the kit comes with the pump preserver as well as four bottle stoppers
Can keep wine fresh for up to 14 days
cons: Some customers report that the cork of the stoppers is too hard and therefore ineffective

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I have many of these myself and thought it would go great with a bottle of wine for my in laws on Christmas. They loved them!! We frequently use them at home and they are extra useful for many things alcoholic and non as well.
customer_reviews.author: crystal N.

customer_reviews.title: these are best especially for saving left over wines to be used ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave all my savers away at a recent party and boy did i miss them. these are best especially for saving left over wines to be used in cooking.
customer_reviews.author: susie

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I finally replaced an older version and I wish I had done that sooner. I no longer need to run the stopper under water and I'm getting a better seal now that I have the new one.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This wine saver pump is reliable and easy to use. The pump is not as hard as others we have had. You have to pump more times but with less force. That just makes it easier for us. I was concerned that the stoppers might not seal tightly, but we just run water on them, shake the excess off and insert into the bottle. We haven't experienced one instance where they did not maintain a seal.
customer_reviews.author: Jane M.

customer_reviews.title: Check their returned items for a great deal.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two new wine savers and one repackaged. They arrived promptly all as described. The repackaged wine saver was as perfect as the new at a great price. They were a gift so I can’t testify to their effectiveness but they are a good vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas 3.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: bought as a gift she liked it easy to use and came with directions.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Caporelli

customer_reviews.title: This Product Delivers
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a Christmas present and was so impressed I have now bought this item for all my friends and family. Simple to use and it really does improve the drinkability of the wine days later
customer_reviews.author: Aotearoa

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use and works quite well. Having like 4 stoppers were great as we usually have a couple of bottles open at one time to accomodate varying tastes. Definitely something you can give to wine lovers as it savors the taste better.
customer_reviews.author: Alamat

customer_reviews.title: This is a Chinese Knock off - Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Wanted VacuVin, the picture is from their trademark, and they use "The Original" like them. Anything but a VacuVin. Bought as a gift for my Lady, first bottled shared and when placed back in wine rack (A red) it immediately started to leak. Needless to say, there was to vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Ray

customer_reviews.title: Terribe. DOES NOT WORK!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely weak sealant! Barely works. I've been using vacuum sealants for over 10 years now. I am a very, very fussy wine drinker. I believed a bottle of wine had to be drunk the day it's opened, until I discovered wine vacuum sealants. I was using a white pump with light grey sealants, and it was fantastic! I had just one sealant and so I bought this to have extra around. What an absolute waste of money! Do yourself a favour and don't waste your money or wine!
customer_reviews.author: DHay

customer_reviews.title: Not the original vacuvin.
customer_reviews.text: Warning. This is not the original vacuvin wine preserver. It is another brand and different in design from the vacuvin. I feel using the term “original” is misleading. In my tests it is not as effective as the vacuvin.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph S. Miller

customer_reviews.title: More durable than competitors... but at a cost.
customer_reviews.text: The stoppers stick to the pump a bit... potentially undoing the vacuum job you just laboriously performed!
customer_reviews.author: [ sc'Que? ]

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: Product was old / hard rubber. Didn't seal . Said would send credit, never got.
customer_reviews.author: Active buyer

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend this to anyone who drinks wine!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the product. Bought this on advice from friend. Impressed by the email offering support should there be any problem. Good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: jh

customer_reviews.title: You don't have to drink a whole bottle or through it away!
customer_reviews.text: It preserves the uncorked quality of the wine for weeks. Manufacturer's would prefer you guzzle it all or throw wine away in order to sell more wine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not anything as good as original equipment
customer_reviews.text: Well I thought I bought a Vacu Vin and this just does not work well, it is inferior and I wish I bought the real vacu vin. So I do not recommend this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P. Dykstra

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this pump several times and it does not click to seal the bottle. Very disappointed, It didn't even come in a box. I think I got a cheap knock off!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Works!
customer_reviews.text: I was never one to try to save a half-empty wine bottle but I gave this a shot and I'm loving it because it pumps the excess air out with no problem and my pre-opened bottle of wine was fresh and bubbly - love love love!!!
customer_reviews.author: Minz

customer_reviews.title: Watch the name of the product.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was ordering a OXO product for a gift, that's what I was searching for. Instead it brought me to this cheap knock-off of the OXO stopper. Annoyed I didn't read what I was getting.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald A. Lamparter

customer_reviews.title: Misrepresented as VacuVin
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this product, they were using VacuVin stock images instead of making it clear that this isn't the same product. It felt much cheaper than the name brand item, and I actually mistook it for the VacuVin. It came across as intentionally deceptive. It appears they've changed the name since then, but please be aware this is not a VacuVin!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Jones

customer_reviews.title: Takes some of the air out but not all
customer_reviews.text: The vaccume system is subpar. Helps keep the wine fresh for another 24 hours but that's it.
customer_reviews.author: Gisselle

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. It broke after 2 months of light use. Maybe 10 times I used it and the handle broke off
customer_reviews.author: Crocitto

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Not the same as the original. Still work just doesn't click like the original.
customer_reviews.author: iBUY Stuff

customer_reviews.title: Just doesn’t work as well as other models
customer_reviews.text: The rubber stoppers are too stiff and don’t seem to hold a seal well.
customer_reviews.author: NGHS

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t click like some of the others so you don’t know if it’s working or done.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Ross

customer_reviews.title: Too much airflow instead of a good vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: Product only works partially as well as my old one; it seems to have too much airflow instead of a good vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B Boyd/ wife

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: well worth the money -works great - ez to use
customer_reviews.author: Michael Biagi

customer_reviews.title: Works well and simple
customer_reviews.text: Worked exactly as advertised. Very easy to use with simple instructions. Seller also followed up with emails to ensure I was satisfied with my purchase. I’m a happy customer and would purchase from them again.
customer_reviews.author: reiner andre

customer_reviews.title: Happy so far with this product
customer_reviews.text: Used few times so far and seems to do what it says! Hopefully the rubber ridges on the stopper last; I had another brand where the rubber ridges started pulling away after time. Happy so far with this product.
customer_reviews.author: ansel

customer_reviews.title: Saves the [rare] leftover wine
customer_reviews.text: .Works well with the vacuum air pump in keeping wine fresher for a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Duke

customer_reviews.title: Must have in every house!
customer_reviews.text: Works just as described! It is one of those must haves in every house... Comes with stoppers also, which makes it a great combo. I would definitely buy again for friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: FREDERIC MORGAN

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Wine Fresh
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this for myself a few years ago and ordered it for a friend, I like the way it keeps wine freah after using the pump/vacuum
customer_reviews.author: Bill B

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product, but they don’t make a click sound like before to let you know when to stop pumping. Otherwise good, does what it’s meant to do
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Had another one for a couple of years. Works great and preserves wine much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ❄️❄️❄️❄️❄️❄️
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I use it for wine bottles at my home to keep it fresh . It does the job!!
customer_reviews.author: marquee

customer_reviews.title: Love this product.
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived exactly when it was supposed to. It's easy to use and easy to store. I love it.

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: Only thing that I had problems with was determining when the pump had reached the end.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara F.

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it was used.
customer_reviews.text: This product had been used before I opened it. I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product was as describe,  It's doing the job.  Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: Product was as describe, It's doing the job. Great gift.

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient and great for keeping wine tasting great!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a family member because we have had such great service from ours. Keeps the wine fresh and tasting great! I love this product.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I loved that it was easy to use and sealed really well. It appears to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Julia M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Kept my wine tasting fresh weeks after I had opened it.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, easy to use, keep remaining wine in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Client d'Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love mine and purchased this set for a friend. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Goodman

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The clearance on the vacuum pump does allow a strong vacuum there not protecting the wine
customer_reviews.author: Milton Norsworthy

customer_reviews.title: Unprofessional Packaging
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift. Felt deceived - as if it was a returned item. It came in a plastic ziptop baggie - no instructions. No paper, box or label identifying the product. Felt like it came from a flea market. Disappointed. Will return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the product but I only received 3 of the ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but I only received 3 of the plugs when the order should have had 4.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Lync

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived with only 2 stoppers and NO pump on the first order. Finally received the whole thing and it does not extract the vacuum as well as the old one we lost. In fact there is NO vacuum created.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Resealing a Bottle
customer_reviews.text: I now give these as gifts to my friends who only want to drink one or two glasses of wine a day. This device is perfect for resealing the bottle!! One friend even used it on a beer bottle when he was interrupted and had to put the unfinished beer aside until the next day. It worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Ibuystuff

customer_reviews.title: I actually bought this for my father who does not ...
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this for my father who does not regularly drink wine. He may have a bottle of beer in the evening but often times does not finish it. So half a bottle of beer or hard cider goes down the drain. He loves these and I have been recommending them to friends. Works well on my craft beers.
customer_reviews.author: D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect solution when you don't finish a bottle of wine.
customer_reviews.author: tjblajolla

customer_reviews.title: Underwhelming at best!
customer_reviews.text: Corks are I’ll fitting, suction is chancy, seal and air tightness are questionable.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Smith

customer_reviews.title: Keeps wine fresher for the next day.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set because it was the most economical way to get more corks, which is what I really needed. This system works well to pull the air out of wine you wish to store. It takes some pumping to remove all the air out of a bottle without much wine left, but once the pump begins resisting, you know you have created a good vacuum. It does make the wine last longer, but we usually polish a bottle in two days.
customer_reviews.author: Cow Town Girl

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny it costs!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this type vacuum pump for my wine use for years. It truly keeps the bottle from turning into vinegar and going off until it can b completely used or consumed. I’ve given several for gifts as well. Well worth the money if you don’t like wasting wine. I think it’s alcohol abuse if u have to throw out wine... teehee.
customer_reviews.author: Mommafoot

customer_reviews.title: Very simple and efficient
customer_reviews.text: This is the third different wine stopper/set that i have purchased. The previous two (different manufacturer) were bulky and lost their vacuum ability after a few months. This set is compact and holds a very good seal, and pleasantly comes with its own slide close pouch ( keeps everything together!)
customer_reviews.author: gstewart58

customer_reviews.title: Great modest gift for wine drinkers
customer_reviews.text: Have seen others struggle attempting to balance the bottle on a counter while using, (bottle could slip) best to hold bottle between legs for full control.
customer_reviews.author: Franky

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent Buy.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second wine saver pump. I have an older one that I’ve had for several years now and I’ve been pleased with it. This one I purchased for my daughter’s house. The stoppers hav never leaked even with the bottles lying on their side. Removing the air from the wine bottle when re-corking them definitely preserves the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Public Name

customer_reviews.title: Love it - Fresh Wine all the time.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. The system really does keep the wine fresh, and it's so easy to use. Just pump the air out and there you have it - fresh for the next time. Good purchase, will buy more for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works great and better than the other ones on the market
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't live without this. It works great and better than the other ones on the market. I accidentally purchased another brand and returned because the stoppers were too plastic without the nice rubber seals.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth D

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as Vacuvin
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was an original Vacuvin and it’s misleading that they use “original” in the product name. THe pump is ineffective. Tried it side by side with a Vacuvin and it’s nowhere near as good.
customer_reviews.author: G. Postlethwaite

customer_reviews.title: a valuable household staple
customer_reviews.text: I always have one on hand for obvious reasons; but misplaced mine. Yours is good and very reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: Love this wine saver
customer_reviews.text: Love this wine saver! We went to a winery for Sunday funday and came across this gem! So we gave it a shot a ordered it! And it’s a hit in our house.
customer_reviews.author: Alli_bell

customer_reviews.title: Great product made of good quality material and reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Great product made of good quality material and reasonable price. Thank you & yes I would buy from you again. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie Judd

customer_reviews.title: it actually works!! it's a cheap solution for ...
customer_reviews.text: it actually works!! it's a cheap solution for saving those bottles of wine that you can't finish in a day.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica P.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible product. 4 out of 4 seals did not work. Looks like a fraudulent product.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product, seems like it will last forever.
customer_reviews.text: This wine pump is great, it does the job and is a sturdy, well made product, glad I chose this company to order from.
customer_reviews.author: Frayne P.

customer_reviews.title: These are great. I host wine tastings every Friday and they're ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I host wine tastings every Friday and they're very easy to use. The pump allows me to seal and use the bottles again.
customer_reviews.author: Couldn't put it down!

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: It works. It's very helpful to save wine in the long term.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient, easy to use, and works as advertised. Highly recommended for short-term wine preservation. I would readily buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: R. Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Wine drinker should use this.
customer_reviews.text: Pumps and seals the bottles just fine. A plus was that it was compatible with a set we purchased many years ago. Price was right. It really will help preserve opened bottles of wine longer.
customer_reviews.author: Omega-man

customer_reviews.title: Not bad - you get what you pay for though
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for Vacuvin pump. Works OK. Main differences: 1. When Vacuvin "clicks" when it is done pulling out the air - this one doesn't A minor annoyance, but I have to guess if the air is all out. 2. I noticed some moisture when I get to sucking all the air out - not sure if that means some of the liquid is coming out, or if it's just condensation.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Ongg

customer_reviews.title: The product is great but the packaging it came in was so terrible
customer_reviews.text: The product is great but the packaging it came in was so terrible. Little flimsy plastic bags which didn't even hold the items, they had broken through the bag and fallen out. We had to buy different packaging since they were a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kati

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work. Pieces for but they don't deal. I've used one before and these ones simply do not work
customer_reviews.author: JT Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Deceiving
customer_reviews.text: I didn't receive what is pictured. I received 3 stoppers that looked used in a plastic bag so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Dmarie

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: This was intended as a gift. It arrived in what looked like a torn Ziplok sandwich bag. The pump did not exhaust much air (and didn't get more difficult to operate as I went on pumping, a warning sign). It produced only a slight vacuum at best. I tried two of the stoppers using my own pump; one failed to seal at all, the other only partially. Perhaps I just got a lemon, but it seemed to me to be a piece of junk. If the original wine saver pump performed like this it is difficult to see how it became an essential household tool... I returned it at once.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Middleton

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: the pump works because I tried with my original stoppers, but these stoppers do not stay airtight.
customer_reviews.author: joesph giordano

product_meta.title: United Wine Saver Pump Preserver with 4 Vacuum Bottle Stoppers (Black Original)
feature_bullets: This United Wine Saver pump can help to create an airtight vacuum that preserves wine once the bottle has been opened, prevents the oxidation process that is responsible for the deterioration of wine, can keep wine fresh and tasty even for 14 days. Vacu Vin compatible.

Easy to Use: 1: Put the smaller side of the black bottle stopper in to the bottle mouth. 2: Put the wine saver pump to connect the stopper's top. 3: Pump the air out until you fell strong air resistance, then it is ok!

Premium Quality: Unlike fragile plastic wine saver pumps, our wine saver vacuum pump is made of strong materials that can last a life time, and the pump handle is ergonomically designed for easier pumping action and designed to avoid pinching that can occur with other pumps.
Perfect for wine tasting evenings! Our United Wine Savers products comes with 4 bottle stoppers, you can enjoy multiple wines at the same time, and not worry about the wine go bad.
What You Get: 1 x United Wine Saver pump, 4 x bottle stoppers (all re-usable), and friendly and easy-to-reach support!
